Let them…show us what shall happen. For emphasis, Isaiah twice rephrases this statement as declare us things for to come and show the things that are to come hereafter (41:23). The Lord challenges the false gods to prophesy, to tell what will happen in the future, an act that only God can do, often through his prophets.

let them show the former things. The false gods are not even able to tell things that have already happened, because they are not living. Even men are able to relate historical facts.
